meta.description: Disallow certain properties on certain objects

content.introduction:
Disallow certain properties on certain objects
Table of ContentsRule DetailsOptionsWhen Not To Use ItRelated RulesVersionResources
Certain properties on objects may be disallowed in a codebase. This is useful for deprecating an API or restricting usage of a moduleâ€™s methods. For example, you may want to disallow usingdescribe.onlywhen using Mocha or telling people to useObject.assigninstead of_.extend.
